Gavin Nichols (Charlie Hunnam) is a young man who is on the edge of a building, threatening to jump. Detective Lucetti Hollis (Terrence Howard) is sent to stop him and talk to him, he discovers that Gavin is being forced to jump before noon. The conversation makes Gavin and Hollis expose their religious views in a true clash of philosophical questions.
